summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new Admin Panel Gallery Management feature. All backend APIs (CRUD operations) and frontend functionality working correctly. Gallery tab appears in admin navigation, Add Image form works, toggle visibility works, delete works. Public Gallery page correctly fetches from API with fallback to default images when database is empty.
critical_code_review_comments: Gallery API endpoints properly secured with admin auth
Public /api/gallery endpoint returns only active items (is_active: true)
Frontend GalleryPage.jsx properly handles empty API response with fallback to defaultGalleryItems
seed_data_creation: No seed data needed - tests create and clean up their own test data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Gallery management feature fully tested. All CRUD operations work. Public gallery falls back to 19 default images when DB is empty. Admin panel has Gallery tab in navigation with Add Image form containing Title, Category dropdown, and Image URL fields.

admin_login.details: Admin login with username 'admin' and password 'admin' works

gallery_tab_in_admin.details: Gallery tab appears in admin navigation between 'Post Special' and 'Social'

add_image_button.details: Add Image button opens the gallery form

gallery_form_fields.details: Form has Title input, Category dropdown (Food/Ambiance/Drinks/Promotional), Image URL input, and Upload button

create_gallery_item_api.details: POST /api/admin/gallery creates new item with id, is_active=true by default

gallery_items_display.details: Created items display in admin panel with image, title, category badge, and action buttons

toggle_visibility.details: Toggle button changes is_active, hidden items show 'Hidden' overlay and don't appear in public gallery

delete_gallery_item.details: Delete button removes item with confirmation dialog, shows success toast

public_gallery_api.details: GET /api/gallery returns only active items, empty array when no active items

gallery_page_db_items.details: Gallery page shows database items when available, correctly transforms data

gallery_page_fallback.details: When DB is empty, Gallery page falls back to 19 defaultGalleryItems with F&F restaurant images

gallery_lightbox.details: Clicking gallery item opens lightbox with close button
